Name: Mail Received After Cancellation
Subject: Important: Mail received after your VirtualAddressHub plan ended
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

We wanted to inform you that your Virtual Mailbox Plan subscription has been cancelled, but we have recently received post addressed to you or your company.

As your plan is no longer active, we will need to return this mail to the sender shortly.

If you’d like to avoid this and have us continue processing your mail, please reactivate your account as soon as possible.

You can restart your plan here:
Reactivate my plan

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reply to this email.

Thank you for choosing VirtualAddressHub.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
TextBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

We wanted to inform you that your VirtualAddressHub subscription has been cancelled, but we have recently received post addressed to you or your company.

As your plan is no longer active, we will need to return this mail to the sender shortly.

If you’d like to avoid this and have us continue processing your mail, please reactivate your account as soon as possible.

You can restart your plan here: {{restart_link}}

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reply to this email.

Thank you for choosing VirtualAddressHub.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
